BR_text.BRsummary: [REGRESSION/TF-Lite] Specific tf-lite model get seg fault
BR_text.BRdescription:
After <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/pull/2578>#2578</denchmark-link>
 , native APP pose-estimation got segmentation faults.
 At first invoke the pointers of input and output tensors are changed.
 Ex)
 code:
 ...
 nns_logw ("The ptr of input tensor before invoke: %p",interpreter->tensor (interpreter->inputs ()[0]));
 status = interpreter->Invoke ();
 nns_logw ("The ptr of input tensor after invoke: %p",interpreter->tensor (interpreter->inputs ()[0]));
 ...
 log:
 *** WARNING ***: The ptr of input tensor before invoke: 0x56151998ac40
 *** WARNING ***: The ptr of input tensor after invoke: 0x7fa994030550
 After the first invoke, the ptr remains same.

comments_0.comment_text:
: Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/2665>#2665</denchmark-link>
 . The person in charge will reply soon.
